scripts.start: rm -rf dist && npm run watch:eleventy & npm run watch:styles
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && eleventy && npm run build:styles
scripts.build:styles: npx sass --no-source-map src/styles/index.scss dist/styles/index.css && npx postcss dist/styles/index.css --use --use autoprefixer --use postcss-csso --no-map --output dist/styles/index.css
scripts.test: npm run testHtml && npm run stylelint && npm run esLint && npm run eeditorconfigCheck
